alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Kaufman; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 7:38PM CDT until March 16 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kaufman County in north central Texas... Southern Van Zandt County in north central Texas... Henderson County in central Texas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mabank, or over Gun Barrel City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 65 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Mabank, Chandler, Malakoff, Tool, Seven Points, Kemp, Brownsboro, Eustace, Berryville, Edom, Enchanted Oaks, Caney City, Lake Palestine, Forest Grove Reservoir, Purtis Creek State Park, Flag Lake, Cedar Creek Reservoir and Redland. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 540 and 542. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...65 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for central and north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows. Heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
